page.title: 09SCHOOLS NEAR KIRKBURTON
page.content: I started at Highburton First School when I was 4 years old. I liked Topic lesson best because it was interesting I liked the school because all the children and teachers were friendly. Now I am at Kirkburton Middle School.We start here at 10 years old and stay for 3 years. I like this school because there are a lot of different subjects and a lot more friends to play with. When I leave I will go to Shelley High School.You can leave there when you are 16 or stay on until you are 18. If you leave at 16 you can go to Technical College or go to work.I think I will go to Technical College. The Special School is right next to our School. Some of us visit their school and some of them come to us. I think that is a good idea because they can be mixed with other children.
